channel.title: MapLibre Board on MapLibre
channel.description: Recent content in MapLibre Board on MapLibre

item.title: Team update and our ongoing commitment to the community
item.description: We’d like to share a recent update regarding our team at MapLibre. Meena, who has been our Head of Marketing and Fundraising, has transitioned out of her role. We’re grateful for her efforts in fostering connections within our community and with our sponsors. We wish her well in her future endeavors.
